HomeTitle: Here you will find a reliable company for your green project
HomeDescr: An innovative online portal allows you as a consumer to submit enquiries anonymously and contact companies from your region publicly and directly. By sending your enquiry to several providers at the same time, you save time and money, while you can easily compare the offers and award the best contract. You also have the opportunity to rate the services provided and thus help other users.

AboutDesc:
Welcome to Solar Energy Solutions, your trusted partner in sustainable 
energy solutions. We are a leading company in the renewable energy 
sector, dedicated to harnessing the power of the sun to create a cleaner and
greener future. With years of experience and a passion for innovation, we 
offer a comprehensive range of solar energy services and solutions 
tailored to meet the diverse needs of our clients!
HowToFindACompanyDesc:
Are you looking for a reliable company that meets your needs? Our blog 
will help you find the perfect partner for your project. You can browse 
through the list of companies in our "Find a Company" section and 
explore their profiles, certifications, and customer reviews. Click the 
button below to go to the list of companies.
HowToFindCustomersDesc:
Are you interested in attracting new customers to your company? Our 
blog provides valuable tips on attracting potential clients. You can browse 
through the list of potential customers in our "Find Customers" section 
and learn about their profiles and needs. Click the button below to go to 
the list of potential customers.
PioneersCompany: Many companies from various sectors use the platform, including leading technology and service companies as well as innovative start-ups and global corporations.
PioneersClients: The platform attracts consumers who value economic action, time savings and environmental friendliness through offers that meet these needs.
PhotovoltaicSystemsDescr: We design, install, and maintain PV systems for clean and renewable electricity.
SystemsWithEnergyStorageDescr: Enhance your solar energy system with advanced battery technologies.
ClientsAreWaitingDesc: Clients are ready to place orders and waiting for you to act.
AirSourceHeatPumpsDescr: Enjoy efficient heating and cooling with our air source heat pumps.
GeothermalSystemsDescr: Harness renewable energy from the earth's subsurface for heating and cooling.
WindEnergyDescr: Generate clean electricity with our wind energy solutions.
BiogasInstallationsDescr: Convert organic waste into renewable energy.
HydrogenInstallationsDescr: Embrace clean energy with our hydrogen solutions.
EnergyConsultantDescr: Get expert guidance for optimizing your energy systems.

TermsOfUseOfTheSiteDesc:
Welcome to Solar Energy Solutions, your trusted source for sustainable 
energy solutions. We offer a wide range of solar services and products to 
meet your unique needs. Join us in creating a cleaner and greener future.
TermList: Here are the topics for the Terms of Use of the site:
lastRow:
By using the Site, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and 
agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.
ChangesToTheTermsOfUse: Changes to the Terms of Use
TermOne: By accessing or using the Site, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use, as well as any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific areas of the Site.
TermTwo: The Site and all its contents, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, videos, software, and any other materials, are the property of the Company or its licensors and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any content from the Site without prior written permission from the Company.
TermThreeA: a. You agree to use the Site for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe upon the rights of others or restrict or inhibit their use and enjoyment of the Site.
TermThreeB: b. You are solely responsible for any content you submit, post, or transmit through the Site. By submitting content, you grant the Company a worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, and non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and display such content in any media.
TermThreeC: c. You agree not to engage in any conduct that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Site or interfere with any other party's use and enjoyment of the Site.
TermFour: Our Privacy Policy governs the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information provided by you when using the Site. By using the Site, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy.
TermFive: The Site may contain links to third-party websites or resources that are not owned or controlled by the Company. The Company is not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of any third-party websites and encourages you to review their respective terms of use and privacy policies.
TermSix: The Site and its contents are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. The Company does not warrant that the Site will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from viruses or other harmful components. Your use of the Site is at your own risk.
TermSeven: In no event shall the Company be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the Site or the inability to use the Site, even if the Company has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
TermEight: The Company reserves the right to modify or update these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use the Site after any changes are made, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.
TermNine: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where the Company is located, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
TermTen: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at

stay: Stay Connected with Automatic Plan Renewal
stayDesc:
Subscribe to our automatic plan renewal for 
uninterrupted access to our services. Say 
goodbye to expiration date worries and enjoy a 
hassle-free experience. Subscribe now for 
seamless service.

Government Subsidies

Benefit from government subsidies for 
sustainable energy systems. Our experts will 
guide you to maximize these subsidies. Embrace
a greener future and save costs while making a 
positive impact. Explore our services today!

a1: Green Technology Germany - the first national platform that brings together strong companies from all areas of renewable energy.
q2: How do I benefit from GTG 24 as an end user?
a2: Easily find the right company for you, optimally tailored to your individual needs. No matter how big the project you are currently planning is - with us you have a reliable partner at your side who will advise you on your project right from the start and accompany you through your project. And that 24 hours a day.
q3: What advantages do I have as a company with GTG 24?
a3: Your qualifications and certifications speak for you and make a valuable contribution to our quality features such as regionality, transparency, sustainable fusion and commitment. In your own admin area you have access to all the data relevant to you.
a4: We, the GTG 24 team, have a common goal: to promote the attractiveness of green energy in all its facets through our efficient support.
a5: To make a valuable contribution to our nature through sustainability, support of regional companies, significant participation in the energy transition and living out shared visions.
a6: Your inquiries via the contact form will be processed 24/7. You can also always reach us at portal{'@'}gtg24.com.
ImportantInformationDescr:
The offers is valid for 84 days from the date of its creation.
Please note that offers from category E-Mobile & Co are valid for 168 days.
